projects.title: FinanceFlow - SaaS Dashboard
projects.summary: A comprehensive financial analytics platform serving 10,000+ users. Built with real-time data processing, interactive charts, and AI-powered insights for small business owners.
projects.description: FinanceFlow is a comprehensive financial analytics platform designed for small business owners. The platform provides real-time insights into revenue, expenses, cash flow, and profitability through interactive dashboards and AI-powered recommendations.
projects.results: 3.2s average page load, 99.9% uptime, 45% increase in user engagement

projects.title: ShopLocal - Mobile E-commerce
projects.summary: Cross-platform mobile marketplace connecting local businesses with customers. Features real-time inventory, push notifications, and integrated payment processing.
projects.description: ShopLocal is a cross-platform mobile marketplace that connects local businesses with nearby customers. The app features real-time inventory management, location-based discovery, secure payment processing, and push notifications for promotions and order updates.

projects.title: NFT Gallery - Web3 Platform
projects.summary: Decentralized NFT marketplace with social features, creator royalties, and multi-chain support. Enables artists to mint, sell, and showcase digital art.
projects.description: NFT Gallery is a decentralized marketplace for digital art with built-in social features. Artists can mint, list, and sell NFTs while maintaining creator royalties on secondary sales. The platform supports multiple blockchains and integrates with popular Web3 wallets.
projects.results: 15k+ NFTs minted, $500k+ trading volume, 3k+ active users

projects.title: HealthAI - Telemedicine Platform
projects.summary: AI-powered healthcare platform with symptom analysis, doctor matching, and video consultations. HIPAA-compliant with advanced security.
projects.description: HealthAI is an AI-powered telemedicine platform that provides symptom analysis, intelligent doctor matching, and secure video consultations. The platform is fully HIPAA-compliant with end-to-end encryption, and uses machine learning to improve diagnostic accuracy over time.

projects.title: TaskMaster - Productivity MVP
projects.summary: Launched in 6 weeks: AI-assisted task management app with smart scheduling, team collaboration, and integrations. Secured $500k seed funding.
projects.description: TaskMaster is an AI-assisted productivity platform built as an MVP in just 6 weeks. The app features smart task scheduling, team collaboration tools, third-party integrations, and AI-powered productivity insights. The MVP helped the founders secure $500k in seed funding.
projects.results: MVP to funding in 3 months, 2k+ beta users, 80% weekly retention
